course.title: CSI 5118 Automated Verification and Validation of Software (3 units)
course.desc: Topics in formal test derivation methods, test management, high-level, CASE-based verification and validation, data-flow & control-flow measures and metrics for assessing quality of designs and code, regression analysis & testing. This course is equivalent to COMP 5302 at Carleton University.Course Component: Lecture
